text: thumb The Hôtel de Ville is the town hall of Liège in Belgium, located on place du Marché. It was built in 1714. It is also known as La Violette. ==Sources== *http://perso.infonie.be/liege06/07sept1.htm *http://users.belgacom.net/cwarzee/place_du_marche/index.htm Liège category:Buildings and structures in Liège
title: Hôtel de Ville, Liège
